name: Beyond Jokers (Base)
summary: Optional heavy singles after PR set if bar speed is good.
rules_markdown: After PR set: add 5–10% per single for 1–3 quality singles; stop before grind.

name: Anchor-Only Jokers
summary: Jokers are Anchor-restricted unless template states otherwise.
rules_markdown: Use only in Anchor; limit total singles; skip on bad days.
